captions.text:
The next game is "Improbable
School", everybody plays!

Elidio, Daniel and Anne will play
three characters in this school,

Andy will be the teacher and he
won't be able to hear anything

because we will make the
characters up now.
Put on the earphone...

Let me see... 'Daniel,
you'll be a kung fu master

who left the swimming pool
with water in his ear'.

'Anne is a doll with
satanic outbursts'.

And you will make up
Elidio's character.

Wait a minute...
Teletubbie, I liked it!

This 'Teletubbie' has a
life dream, what is it?
'To win the Tele Sena lottery'!

All right!
Release Andy, please!

Release Andy and
"Improbable School" starts now!

Good morning, class,
how was your weekend?
I love you!
Good morning! Good morning!

Let's make the roll call.
Number one!

If I jump, the water
won't remain calm.

Because I always
do a pool bomb!

- You can call me Li!
- Li.

- Li!
- Li.
Li... I li!

La, le, li, lo,
Roller Skate Lu!

La, le, li, lo,
Roller Skate Lu!

- I was on my way to class and I bought
you this souvenir! - A souvenir?

- It's a thought...
- A thought?

I ate the cookie, but
brought you this thought...
It's a little wet!

This thought is related to
the question I'm going to ask.

Say it louder, I can't
hear you well in this side.

When we disassemble a machine
to understand the way it works,

that's called something-engineering.
Do you know what it is?

- Re-something...
- Self-knowledge-engineering!

Yes, that could generate
some self-knowledge.

- That's it. - You got an F.
The answer was reverse engineering.

- What was that?
- I killed a fly!

- Number two!
- Hello, teacher! You may say I'm giddy!
But I get upset if you call me Sindy!

In this May we had the 20th
anniversary of the death of a brazilian,

who was very famous,
can you name this brazilian?

- Ken?
- Can you name him?

- Ken?
- No, it's not Ken.

- No?
- You didn't study, right?
I'm gonna give you a kiss.
Help! Help!

The important thing is
to walk and never stop!
I can't hit and turn!
You can go back to your seat.
You got an F.

- F?
- Yes.

F? That's what I'm going
to do with your neck...

I love you!
I love you!
Number three!

I am Bau! And I will
check my tickets now!

What is the name of the brazilian
sportsman who passed away in 1994?

- Sena!
- Very good!
Sena! Sena!

I saw Senna's death
on the tele-vision!

Teacher, I'm trading
the mother's day edition!
With you!

Okay. You kinda got the
name right, that's a 10.
10! I don't have 10...
I finally did it!
Persistence, persistence, persistence.

Okay. Give some applause
if Andy gets it right.

- Well. Daniel...
- Yes!

- He's chinese...
- 'Light'!
Who's also a swimmer.

- A swimmer with water
in his ear. - Yes!

- A lousy swimmer. - But besides
being a lousy swimmer, what is he?
I'll do it again!
And now, the snake!

He's a kung fu fighter...
He's a ninja!

- He's a kung fu master.
- A kung fu master.

- My finest performance.
- Anne is a doll...

- Hello!
- The devil's Barbie!
Okay!
I won't sleep today...
And Elidio...
He's a gambler Teletubbie, right?

- He's a Tele Sena announcer?
- Good enough!

That was "Improbable School",
ladies and gentlemen!

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.
The boss likes to get spanked!
Bring it on, your majesty!

comments.text:
Cara , mas eles ensaiam seus papéis , não q eles roubam, por exemplo , 
quando estão juntos eles imitam um Tele... ou tá vez imitam a X. U.x.a. , 
outra vez uma galinha ou seja eles conhecem a maneira de imitar , o Lic.o 
con certeza já imitou um desses personagens na frente do Andy por isso fica 
mais fácil acertar

Mas esse não é o ponto cara, o que eu disse é que por tudo o que o Elidio 
fez NUNCA dava pra dizer que era um TELETUBIE, talvez alguem com 
deficiencia mental! Mas nunca um teletubie!

comments.text:

assim, os que eles não postam iriam ficando guardados pra algum dia eles 
postarem depois de muito tempo

comments.text:
Adorei!!! Com todos os personagens falando ao mesmo tempo, em alguns 
momentos, fica tudo ainda mais engraçado... nota 1000 pro Lico como 
Teletubbie!!!! Adorei também a imitação do Daniel!!!! Parecia o Bruce Lee 
totalmente sequelado!!!! A Anne, neste vídeo, também mandou muito bem!!! E 
parabéns ao queridíssimo Andy!!!!! Eu adoraria ter um professor assim!!! 
Meu sonho é conferir o show de vocês ao vivo, sabia? Um dia eu vou 
conseguir, tenho fé... Mais sucesso ainda e vida longa aos meus humoristas 
favoritos!!!! Beijos a todos!!!!  ﻿
comments.author: elane maria farias de carvalho

comments.author: xxxalefxxx1

comments.text:
Vocês são mesmo bestas pra acharem que eles lêem os papéis que estão 
escritos ou que possui um roteiro por trás de toda graça. Eles são ótimos o 
suficiente pra conseguirem interpretar um personagem com diversas 
características. E se realmente fosse tudo planejado, ninguém perguntaria 
uma opinião para o pessoal da platéia. E se mesmo assim vocês não 
acreditam, encontre uma entrevista onde o Anderson e o Elídio fala sobre o 
principal desafio do improviso. ﻿
